taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Vulpia microstachys var. ciliata (A. Gray) Lonard & Gould

bio:treatment.description: Spikelets usually with 2-4 florets. Glumes and lemmas sparsely or densely pubescent.
bio:treatment.discussion: Vulpia microstachys var. ciliata grows in loose, sandy soils.
